scripts.cert:setup: mkcert -install || echo "\033[1;31mPlease run again after intalling mkcert: \033[0;31mhttps://github.com/FiloSottile/mkcert#installation\033[0m"
scripts.cert:mkdir: echo "\033[1;35mYou must be in the root of the backend to continue. Press ^C to exit or Enter to continue:\033[0m" && read -r cont && mkdir -p certificates
scripts.cert:generate: npm run cert:mkdir && cd certificates && mkcert localhost
scripts.create:claudia:dev: node scripts/claudia/generate-env-json.js && claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployments-dev --s3-key claudiajs/file.zip  --memory 256 --region us-east-1 --name expense-app-api-dev --runtime nodejs20.x --set-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --role expense-api-lambda-dev --version dev
scripts.create:claudia:prod: node scripts/claudia/generate-env-json.js && claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --use-s3-bucket case-consulting-expense-app-deployments-prod --s3-key claudiajs/file.zip  --memory 256 --region us-east-1 --name expense-app-api-prod --runtime nodejs20.x --set-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --role expense-api-lambda-prod --version prod
scripts.create:claudia:test: node scripts/claudia/generate-env-json.js && claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployments-test --s3-key claudiajs/file.zip  --memory 256 --region us-east-1 --name expense-app-api-test --runtime nodejs20.x --set-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --role expense-api-lambda-test --version test
scripts.predeploy:dev: npm run download:dev && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:claudia:dev && npm run tag:dev && npm run deploy:cloudformation app dev
scripts.predeploy:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=prod && npm run download:prod && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:claudia:prod && npm run tag:prod && npm run deploy:cloudformation app prod
scripts.predeploy:test: npm run download:test && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:claudia:test && npm run tag:test && npm run deploy:cloudformation app test
scripts.download:dev: npm run download:dev:env && npm run download:dev:claudia
scripts.download:dev:env: echo .env chronos/.env thanos/.env timesheet-submission-reminder/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-expense-app-resources-dev/.env
scripts.download:local:env: echo .env chronos/.env thanos/.env timesheet-submission-reminder/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-expense-app-resources-local/.env
scripts.download:prod: npm run download:prod:env && npm run download:prod:claudia
scripts.download:prod:env: echo .env chronos/.env thanos/.env timesheet-submission-reminder/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-consulting-expense-app-resources-prod/.env
scripts.download:test: npm run download:test:env && npm run download:test:claudia
scripts.download:test:env: echo .env chronos/.env thanos/.env timesheet-submission-reminder/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-expense-app-resources-test/.env
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run eslint && npm run test
scripts.reinstall: npm install && npm ci && npm run reinstall:chronos && npm run reinstall:leaderboard && npm run reinstall:portal-data-sync && npm run reinstall:thanos && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.reinstall:chronos: cd chronos && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:layers: (cd layers/dependencies/nodejs && npm install && npm ci) && (cd layers/shared/nodejs && npm install && npm ci)
scripts.reinstall:leaderboard: cd crons/leaderboard && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:portal-data-sync: cd portal-data-sync && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:thanos: cd thanos && npm install && npm ci
scripts.update:dev: node scripts/claudia/generate-env-json.js && claudia update --runtime nodejs20.x --handler lambda.handler --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployments-dev --s3-key claudiajs/file.zip --memory 256 --update-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --timeout 60 --version dev
scripts.update:prod: node scripts/claudia/generate-env-json.js && claudia update --runtime nodejs20.x --handler lambda.handler --use-s3-bucket case-consulting-expense-app-deployments-prod --s3-key claudiajs/file.zip --memory 256 --update-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --timeout 60 --version prod
scripts.update:test: node scripts/claudia/generate-env-json.js && claudia update --runtime nodejs20.x --handler lambda.handler --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployments-test --s3-key claudiajs/file.zip --memory 256 --update-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --timeout 60 --version test
